questions.question: Arrange in the order of 5 levels of maturity
What are the Key Focus Areas of DATOM
Are there specific visualizations available in DATOM to track the DG Metrics
What is the core principle of DATOM?
questions.answer: There is no single solution in Data & Analytics space. A fabric of solutions needs to be woven.

questions.question: What is the difference between Data Owner and Data Steward?
questions.answer: Data Steward controls the data quality on a day to day basis for a data set

questions.question: Which is not a Key Result Areas in DATOM?
Which of the following aspects of EA includes Process Aligned KPIs, Data Models, Metadata Mgmt., DQ Mgmt., MDM, ILM & Data Security?
What is the theme of 5th maturity level ?
Identify a business question that can be answered only by Level 5 matured organization.
questions.answer: Do you collect social data on your partners to assess their market reputation, are any insights generated on this to help with contract negotiations?

questions.question: Zachman Framework has been used by DATOM to ?
questions.answer: To identify alignment between different service delivery methodologies

questions.question: The solution ccelertor for Digitised data controls is
What is the maturity level of a company which has implemented Big Data Cloudification, Recommendation Engine Self Service, Machine Learning, Agile & Factory model ?
For a Level 2 matured organization, which statement is true from Master Data Management perspective?
questions.answer: Master Data is elevated to the Enterprise level, with mechanism to manage and access it.

questions.question: Data Ownership is defined by
questions.answer: Any of options based on scale of the organization

questions.question: As per DATOM, which of the following options best describes Unstructured DQ Mgmt.?
questions.answer: Gather-Analyze-Recommend X Data Quality Index X
